content:
I tried this foundation after wearing Becca (which I still love) for about two years. 
I love this foundation. The color is perfect and it's completely buildable.

This foundation is amazing, full coverage, long lasting, and doesnt flake if i have dry skin. 
I'm very fair, and this is like second skin, goes on so smoothly. 
highly recommend this foundation
Started with the stick version, when they were out of stock I switched to the liquid and I'll never go back! Stays put much better, blends flawlessly

Sublime. I bought this and the urban decay all Nighter to wear all day/work out in to compare. This provided the perfect coverage with no breakage or dryness (like urban decay). I shouldn’t have bothered. I’ll be returning and using this exclusively. The staying power and glow from this product is so impressive!
title: Who knew!
Love Love Love
My new holigrail
Best thing I've put on my face

name: Teint Idole Ultra Long Wear Foundation
